We can take apart $\green{8}$ to make $\pink4$ and $\blue4$.  
We can put together $\pink4$ and $\blue4$ to make $\green{8}$.

question.content:
**Fill in the blanks.**  

 | | |
:-: | :-: | :-:
$8-4=$ [[☃ input-number 1]] | because | [[☃ input-number 2]] $+$ $4=8$
